DropShipping is a retail fulfillment method where a store doesn't keep the products it sells in stock. Instead, when a store sells a product, it purchases the item from a third party and has it shipped directly to the customer. As a result, the merchant never sees or handles the product. 

If I say in simple language, For example, you choose a product on AliExpress which is sell rate \$15 USD, You add the product on your own store and you will sell it for \$25 USD. When any customer order on your store, after that you fulfill the order on AliExpress, AliExpress sent the products to your customer, your profit is \$10 USD. It's DropShipping.


What is AliExpress?
AliExpress is an Ebay-like service based in China that is owned by Alibaba. It\’s a marketplace where individuals from all over the world can buy direct from Chinese companies.

 Editor\’s Note: I\’m using the term \“Chinese company\” quite loosely here. Sellers on AliExpress can be individuals, small businesses, trading companies or factories.


The main difference between AliExpress and Ebay is that AliExpress is much larger and far less expensive.

 Because AliExpress is based in China where the labor costs are substantially less, you can find products on AliExpress that are significantly cheaper than anywhere else. 

The huge disparity in cost allows you to make a profit by selling an item at US prices and having it shipped directly from China.


For DropShipping Business first you need to make a E-commerce website or store. 

The biggest difference between dropshipping and the standard retail model is that the selling merchant doesn't stock or own inventory. Instead, the merchant purchases inventory as needed from a third party – usually a wholesaler or manufacturer – to fulfill orders.
DropShipping with Shopify\:

What is Shopify and how does it work? Shopify is a complete commerce platform that lets you start, grow, and manage a business. 

\* Create and customize an online store 

\* Sell in multiple places, including web, mobile, social media, online marketplaces, brick-and-mortar locations, and pop-up shops Manage products, 

\* inventory, payments, and shipping 

\* Shopify is completely cloud-based and hosted, which means you don’t have to worry about upgrading or maintaining software or web servers. This gives you the flexibility to access and run your business from anywhere with an internet connection. 

How much does Shopify cost?
I do not want to tell about Shopify and recommend, because it costs too much, If you want start dropshipping business with Shopify you need around \$300-\$400 USD per month, I think it's big amounts to start.
WordPress and WooCommerce\:

If you want start DropShipping business, I will recommend to start with WordPress and WooCommerce. Because you can start a business for only around \$250 USD for a year. 

What is WordPress? 
WordPress is a free and open-source content management system based on PHP & MySQL. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system. It is most associated with blogging but supports other types of web content including more traditional mailing lists and forums, media galleries, and online stores.

You can easily menage and run website by WordPress. 

What is WooCommerce?
WooCommerce is an open-source e-commerce plugin for WordPress. It is designed for small to large-sized online merchants using WordPress. 

WooCommerce is an plugin of wordpress which is make environment of e-commerce function and manage your e-commerce store. 

If want to start business you need to learn basic concept about WordPress & WooCommerce, You can take the courses to us in our courses section. Or you can learn on YouTube for free. Or you can learn any where. 

What do you need to make a DropShipping Store? 

1. WooCommerce Supported WordPress theme for your store. 

2. AliDropship Plugin to import products from AliExpress. 

3. Domain & Hosting for your store. 

When your store will be ready, after that you can add your products from AliExpress which products you want to sell. 
And you can easily sell your products via Facebook & Google Ads.

We will do everything for your DropShipping store at lower cost. 

You can double check to others marketplaces or developers how much lower cost you can get from us. 
Even until today, I don't think, anyone will give you support like us and low cost.

You can see in below our DropShipping Store & Our Pricing for make full ready DropShipping store.

If you\’re like most people, you probably have some favorite YouTube channels that you love to watch every day. These people might even tell you how they quit their jobs to do YouTube full time. Maybe there\’s a burning fire inside you to learn how to make money on YouTube but you figure it takes too much time, it\’s too hard , and it\’ll never happen. 

It worked from THEM but will never work for you....

Want to know something awesome? 

If you want to be a success on youtube you need to make high-quality content, At this time you thinking which type of content do you will make it. I will give you some tips. 

You can make animation video like(jocks, news, story ex.) 

Right now you can easily make animation videos by using online tools 

Some list Of Online Animation maker: 
* https://www.renderforest.com/animation-maker.html 
* https://www.animaker.com/ 
* https://www.animatron.com/ 
* https://explee.com/ 

It turns out as long as you have a strategy and know what methods to use, making money on YouTube is EASY and FUN and you can do it too\! All you need to do is use these methods while staying consistent with your posting schedule, and you can be on your way to reaching heights of what top YouTube earners like Daniel Middleton (DanTDM) make…16.5 million dollars over the year!

In this article, we\’re going to show you how to make a YouTube channel in less than 5 minutes, the different ways of monetizing a YouTube channel, and give you some extra tips to make sure that your channel will be a success. \n\nBy the end of this article, you’ll have everything you need for how to make money on YouTube.
How to Make Money on YouTube 2019
CHAPTER 1
How to Make a YouTube Channel
CHAPTER 2
How to Make Money on YouTube: The 3 Main Ways
CHAPTER 3
Summary of How to Make Money on YouTube
CHAPTER 4
5 Tips to Monetize Your YouTube Channel
CHAPTER 1 \n\nHow to Make a YouTube Channel
Before you learn how to monetize your YouTube channel, you need to have an actual channel set up\! It\’s extremely easy to get started.
1. Go to Youtube
2. Click \“Sign In\” at the top right corner
3. Sign in or create a Google account
4. Once you\’ve signed in, you can click the gear icon in the top right corner
5. You\’ll then see an option to create an account under your account information
CHAPTER 2 How to Make Money on YouTube: The 3 Main Ways
There are 3 main ways to monetize YouTube which we\’ll teach you about in this article

👉 Become a YouTube partner and make money from ads 

👉 Work with brands as an affiliate or become sponsored 

👉 Sell products or merchandise

Let\’s go over each one and learn how they work.
Become a YouTube partner and make money from ads:

When looking at how to make money on YouTube, the easiest method is through ads: You let YouTube display different types of ads in your videos or alongside them, and when someone clicks on these ads or purchases something, you receive a commission. 

To make money from ads, you’ll need to become a YouTube partner. You can do this by going into the Creator Studio section of your account and enabling monetization. You will also need to sign up for Google’s AdSense network. 

You can find instructions of how to do all of this from Google by clicking YouTube Policy button below.
YouTube Policy
Work with brands as an affiliate or become sponsored:

As your channel grows and you have more subscribers, you may start getting approached by different brands to showcase their products to your audience. This is a great way of earning an income through YouTube, because all you need to do is spend a minute or so showcasing products you love in your videos. 

Sponsors will usually pay you a flat fee for advertising per video, and provide you with a special link so that if someone actually buys a product from them, you also receive an extra commission. It’s a great way to monetize YouTube. 

For example in this video, you can see fitness YouTuber David de las Morenas talk about his sponsor, Vincero Watches. 

Related to this is non-sponsored affiliate marketing. Here you don’t need anybody to approach you, but you just showcase a product or service that pays an affiliate commission if a viewer clicks or buys.
Sell products or merchandise:

If you want to know how to make money on YouTube, it’s a good idea to think ahead into selling your own products or merchandise. YouTubers make a lot of money doing this and for many of them, it’s their main source of income.

Depending on what your channel is about, you might sell: 

👉 Online Courses

👉 E-books

👉 Clothing

👉 Supplements

👉 Board Games

👉 Coaching Packages

As you grow your channel you can start to see what your audience wants combined with what you’d like to create. You can then create your own website where you’ll host your products, and send people there to buy them.
Summary of How to Make Money on YouTube
Here is a summary of the advantages and disadvantages of the main ways of how people can earn money on Youtube:
YouTube partner and AdSense:

Advantages: 

👉 Easy to get started (sign up takes less than 10 minutes) 
👉 Default method on YouTube 
👉 Can earn revenue on your first posted video 

Disadvantages: 

👉 Strict YouTube algorithms may de-monetize your videos for unfair reasons 
👉 Hard to make high revenue unless you have MANY viewers and subscribers
Sponsors and becoming an affiliate:

Advantages: 

👉 Easy to get revenue as all you have to do is talk about a product or include a link for viewers to click 

Disadvantages: 

👉 Depending on what you’re promoting, the revenue could be low per affiliate commission 
👉 Sponsors specifically won’t be interested unless you’re popular on YouTube
Selling products or merchandise

Advantages: 

👉 High revenue potential 
👉 Get paid to create whatever you want 

Disadvantages: 

👉 Will need to have a loyal fan base first before using this income method or invest into search engine optimization
CHAPTER 5 \n\n5 Tips to Monetize Your YouTube Channel
Here are 5 additional tips to monetize your YouTube channel and make more money:
Stay consistent and keep on improving your video quality:

The only way to get more engagement, subscribers, and fans is to consistently put out videos. This is the real secret of monetizing a YouTube channel. 

Not only will this make you more money, but you\’ll get better, feel more comfortable in front of the camera, and end up being more persuasive so you can get your viewers to buy\! 

Once you start creating don\’t stop, and you\’ll see that every day, you get better and better.
Upgrade your equipment:

What videos do you prefer to watch on YouTube? Shaking videos from a bad smartphone camera, or steady videos filmed on a high quality DSLR? We’ve got some good news for you: \n\nWhen you start learning how to make money on youtube, it’s perfectly OK to just use your smartphone. But as you continue to grow your channel, we highly recommend you consider upgrading your equipment.
Make high quality content and listen to your audience:

You know the #1 mistake most creative people make when making their art? 

They ONLY make it for THEM, and not for THEIR AUDIENCE. 

Always put your audience first, think about them, and ask what they want made. Now this doesn\’t mean that you have to make something that you don\’t want to just because your viewers are asking for it. You should be making things both that you want to make, and that your viewers want.
Consider expanding to other channels and making your own website:

The most successful YouTubers have their own personal websites where they sell other items. They also have side channels and others accounts, like podcasts, Instagram, Twitter, and more. \n\nAs you continue to grow, you should think about expanding your reach and creating more channels so you have a higher chance to reach more people. If you\’d like to get started with another channel
Copyright your headlines and create good thumbnails:

To figure out how to make money on YouTube, you need to get good at creating attractive headlines (or titles) for your videos. There are MILLIONS of videos on YouTube and having a good title is what gets people to click, watch, and eventually pay you. \n\nFor example, we searched for \“how to write a book”\ on YouTube and here are some of the results:

We highlighted the two that we liked the best. These titles catch your attention and if you want to write a book and you\’re just starting out, these would make the most sense. Compare these titles to \“BOOK WRITING | EP 1\”. While this video and title might be entertaining, if you want information, you\’d probably be more likely to click on the other two titles.

You can see that the video\’s \“featured image\ or \“thumbnail\” is also really important in getting someone to click on your video, and eventually, pay you! Different influencers will tell you different things about what is best, for example, keeping it simple, versus making it super colorful. 

We recommend that you try out a few different styles and see what your viewers like best. Canva is a great free tool that you can use to make your images.
How to make money from Facebook

Facebook is the world\’s number one social media platform so it\’s easy to see that people want to learn how to make money from Facebook. 

In early 2018, Facebook already had over 2 billion active monthly users, with 500,000 new users added daily. 

It comes in third for most-visited websites, after video-streaming site YouTube and search engine giant Google.
3 Ways to Make Money from a Facebook Account

You can earn money from a Facebook account. It doesn\’t even have to be a business account. An ordinary personal account will do. 

Here are 3 ways how to do this:

1. Facebook Pages

2. Facebook Groups

3. Facebook Profiles

You can apply same method on Facebook Groups,page, profile.
1. Facebook Pages & Groups

I am going to share some actionable methods to make money using Facebook fan page & Facebook groups. 

In fact, I have been managing several pages & groups from some years. And I am making money using those pages & by implementing different methods. 

Growing a Facebook page and monetizing it sounds like fun but it does require hard work to manage them, find contents to post and find ways monetize them. 

But if you don\’t want to put in a lot of time and effort to grow and monetize a page from the bottom. Then, I recommend you to use FPTraffic. 

FPTraffic manages pages with more than 250,000,000 Likes. This tool helps you to find contents with a search and schedule all of them with a click of a button. 

This tool also helps you to make money using Amazon Affiliates links. 

This is a must tool, if you want to save your time & effort while making good chunk of money from Facebook pages. 

Now, that you know how to grow and manage Facebook pages, I am going to share the methods to monetize those pages with you step-by-step. So, let\’s start
1. Affiliate Marketing

If your page & groups is about specific topic, then there may be an affiliate program about the topic or niche. 

A ll you have to do is make a quick google search to find the affiliate program related to your page. 

Search \“your niche + affiliate program\” on google and you will find a lot of affiliate program for your page. 

Find a quality product and learn everything about the product. 

When you are sure about the quality of the product, then you can recommend the products to your fans. 

When you recommend a good product, people will buy it if they find it useful. 

You can also join Amazon Affiliate program where you can find a lot of products that you can recommend to your fans. 

And by using FPTraffic , you can easily schedule posts with your affiliate links without visiting Amazon. 

Affiliate program will give you a tracking link and when your fans purchase the products through your link, you will receive a commission. 

Pro tip: To maximize your earnings, you can create a simple website and write honest review about the product and add your affiliate link while recommending the product. 

Then you can post the article link on your fan page & send traffic to your website. 

People like to read full reviews before purchasing a product. So, this will help you to maximize your affiliate earnings. 

Affiliate marketing is one of the easiest way to make money from your Facebook page.
3. Facebook Fan Page + Groups + Website:

Almost every Facebook pages & groups are doing this and making money. And you can also do the same and make a good amount of money using this method. 

You need to create a website based on your niche and send traffic to your page & groups and make money with sponsored ads displayed on your web page & Affiliate link. 

This method is one of my favorite way to monetize a Facebook fan page. This method has a lot of potential because your fans are interested in your niche then you can write entertaining contents or hot news about your niche and post on your page to get traffic. 

And when you publish hot and trending news, chance are \“Your article will go viral on Facebook\”. 

You can make huge money using this method, you just have to stay consistent.
4. Selling Your Fan Pages & Groups:

There are a lot of marketplace to buy/sell Facebook pages & Facebook Groups. If your page is in hot niche & has potential reach, then you can get a good price. 

I even know some people who grows Facebook pages and sells as their business. 

You can find some website which make a deal of fan pages, but I haven\’t used any of them. So, I don\’t recommend them. 

There are also some groups on Facebook itself, where you can sell your fan page by using the admin of the group as middleman. 

Please use your sense while making a deal to avoid getting scammed.
Facebook video Monetization

One thing that\’s hot right now on Facebook is videos. It\’s very easy to make videos viral on Facebook. As, everyone loves to watch videos. 

And with Facebook\’s video ad breaks, you can make good money from your Facebook fan page. 

Ad breaks are short video ads that you can place in your content. Your video must be 3 minutes to long to show ads. 

According to Facebook, here are few more requirements to become eligible for video ad break:- 

1. You must have 10,000 followers on your page. 

2. You must have 30,000 one minute views in the last 60 days Facebook ad breaks are only available few countries , You can check your country available or not. So you must be from one of these countries to become eligible for ad breaks. 

If you are passionate about creating videos , you can make good amount of money from fan page using Ad breaks.

Can you make money blogging? 

What are the various ways to make money from blogging? 

How much can I earn? 

Can I talk about my life and make money? 

What should I blog about to make money? 

These are just some of the most common question bloggers at various level \(Beginners, Intermediate\) have and in this exclusive guide, I\’m helping you to answer all these questions. I will also show you some of the best ways to make money blogging that you can use in 2019 and the years to come.
How to make money by Blogging
How Much Can You Earn From Blogging?

Whether you\’re looking to supplement your income with a little extra to pay for a few nice treats or create a blog that will support your lifestyle then you can pretty much make as much money as you like from blogging if you are prepared to put in the hard work. 

There are lots of great stories out there of successful bloggers who make money blogging: 

For example over the past couple of years, husband and wife team, Bjork and Lindsay at PinchofYum.com, a food and recipe blog, have built up a huge following and some months they have made nearly \$25k. 

Another blogging couple, Yeison and Samantha, who run mytanfeet.com are making over $5k per month while they travel the world and share their photos and stories on their blog. 

I\’m not going to lie to you but it can take months even years before you might see a significant return on the time you invest in to starting a blog but that is why I have created this free guide so that you can be confident in taking the right steps to achieving your blogging goals. 

So let’s start..
How to Pick a Profitable Blog Niche?

This is the most critical step. Seriously. 

There is no point in starting a blog that you want to make money from without a plan. There are thousands, even hundreds of niches out there.Some are broad and huge; some are small and virtually unknown. Some niches are easier to make money in than others. 

This is why your research is important. 

A good place to start when you are picking a niche is to look at your own interests in Google. 

Think about niche select your niche or you can search on google "how to select profitable blogging niche" .
What Will You Need to Make Money Blogging

If you\’re planning to make money from blogging then it goes with out saying that you will need to make a blog. 

When anyone asks me about starting a professional money making blog I always recommend them to use self hosted WordPress as it\’s the best platform for bloggers. You can easily manage WordPress. 

If you need WordPress blogging websites you can contact with us we will make for you at low cost, Even we will teach you how can you manage your blogging websites by wordpress. 

You can check our demo blogging websites. 

Click on below button to see our demo sites & pricing for make full ready blogging websites.
1. Get a Blog:
Demo & Pricing Blogging Sites
2. Create Great Content:

So now that you have built your blog you are ready to create some blog posts for your readers. 

The reason this section is called \“Great Content\” is because your content really does need to be of a high standard. Everyday millions of blog posts are published on the internet and with so much competition for our limited attention spans you really have to be creating blog posts people are going to want to read and perhaps even share on social media or on their own blogs. 

Make sure your posts are: 

* Well formatted and look good with relevant images 

* Are in-depth and entertaining 

* Offer links to other posts to expand on points
3. Build Up Your Audienc:e

I started my first ever blog by writing on a consistent schedule about myself, my hobbies and interests. People found me via Google, Facebook, social media and my readership gradually grew over time to where it is today. 

Once I had built up an audience, making money from blogging became an afterthought. 

When you have a large group of fans interested in what you have to say, the money will come. Trust me on that. 

The hard part is finding and gathering your fans.
Promote your blog:
No matter how great your articles are no one is going to know about them unless you take time to promote your blog.
You need learn about SEO, you can get users from google search, you can\'t imagine how many users you get from google search engine
Best Ways to Make Money from Your Blog – Ways To Monetize Your Blog
So now that we have covered the basics of building up your blog and it’s following lets have a look at some different ways you can begin to monetize your blog and start earning.
Affiliate Marketing:

Affiliate marketing is a kind of performance-based marketing and a beast at monetizing your blog. With this form of marketing, business owners reward affiliates for each customer brought to the company through the affiliate\’s independent advertising endeavors. There are four key players in affiliate marketing: 

* the merchant 

* the network 

* the publisher 

* the customer 

As a result of its increasing complexity, the affiliate marketing world has evolved to include a subset of players which includes specialized third party vendors, affiliate management agencies, and super-affiliates. 

Affiliate marketing works in conjunction with several other online advertising mechanisms. This is the case because affiliates will often use these platforms for marketing purposes. Some of the mechanisms include search engine optimization (SEO), e-mail marketing, paid search engine marketing (PPC-Pay Per Click), display advertising, and content marketing. At the same time, affiliates can also appropriate less traditional advertising methods. An example would be publishing reviews of services or products. 

In many cases, affiliate marketing is confused with referral marketing. This is likely the case because both marketing methods involve the use of third parties who drive business to a retailer. 

If you are planning to become an affiliate marketer then it might be a good idea to sign up to an affiliate network such as Shareasale or ClickBank in order to find offers to promote.
Modern Ways To Make Money from Your Blog:

There are various methods that you can use to monetize your blog. Depending upon your level of blogging and the kind of blog, you could pick the method that matches with your style. Do check the end of this article to get the answers to many important questions asked by bloggers like you.

1. Ad Networks like AdSense,Media.net 

2. Direct Advertisements 

3. Affiliate marketing 

4. Paid reviews 

5. Sell your eBook 

6. Launch an Online Course 

7. Offer Online consulting 

8. Offer Services based on your skills
